    • Method Detail

      • applying

        public static <F,T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<F> applying(@NotNull
                                                     Function<F,T> function,
                                                     @NotNull
                                                     org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super T> delegateMatcher)

        Applies a transformation to the value before comparing the transformed result with the given matcher.

        Type Parameters:
        F - type to input into assertion
        T - actual value type to compare
        Parameters:
        function - the function to apply to convert the asserted value to the target value
        delegateMatcher - matcher to apply to the transformed value; typically the state of the component under test
        Returns:
        matcher which transforms input before comparison
        Since:
        0.1.3

      • waitFor

        public static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> waitFor(@NotNull
                                                  org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> originalMatcher,
                                                  long timeoutMs)
        Creates a matcher which waits for the embedded matcher to evaluate to true. It is required that the embedded matcher checks a mutable aspect of the matched object thus typical default matchers like equalTo won't work.
        Type Parameters:
        T - accepted value type of the original matcher
        Parameters:
        originalMatcher - the original matcher to wait to return true
        timeoutMs - timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        matcher which waits
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • waitFor

        public static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> waitFor(@NotNull
                                                  org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> originalMatcher,
                                                  long timeout,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Creates a matcher which waits for the embedded matcher to evaluate to true. It is required that the embedded matcher checks a mutable aspect of the matched object thus typical default matchers like equalTo won't work.
        Type Parameters:
        T - accepted value type of the original matcher
        Parameters:
        originalMatcher - the original matcher to wait to return true
        timeout - timeout amount
        timeUnit - timeout unit
        Returns:
        matcher which waits
        Since:
        0.1.0
